channel.title: Rnb on album club
channel.description: Recent content in Rnb on album club

item.title: Mk.Gee - Two Star & the Dream Police
item.description:
matt

I found 2 star from mk.gee really interesting in a way idk. It’s like conventional but not? Have you heard it? No i super like them. Loads of different styles in the album too Tbh I’m loving this album so I’d love your opinion on it

garbhan

I listened to it this morning and really liked it Only other album I’ve heard to the ML Bush sound well Sounded very 80s soul-pop inspired too Production was fantastic, vocals were one of the highlights Yeah first listen was lovely, going to give it another when I’ve time tomorrow
